# observe_default_dashboard

Manages the default dashboard for a dataset. This will be displayed in the UI when opening the dataset.

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `dashboard` (String)
- `dataset` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
